name: Tinkatuff
flavorText: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.

previous.name: Tinkatink
previous.flavorText: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

next.name: Tinkaton
next.flavorText: This intelligent Pokémon has a very daring disposition. It knocks rocks into the sky with its hammer, aiming for flying Corviknight.
